strapiPost.title: New Coffee Shop And Undercroft Turns Tropical
strapiPost.content:
There is a new coffee location opening up today in Bentonville and Undercroft turns tropical launching their Oasis themed pop up bar.

  • New spot: Red Kite Coffee Co. has a new location at the Crystal Flats and the soft opening is today! The shop will be open 7a-2p through Sunday to give the crew a chance to settle in. This marks Red Kite's 3rd location in NWA. You can see this location and other coffee spots in our guide here.
  • Oasis at Undercroft: A tropical-themed pop up has taken over Bentonvilleâ€™s Undercroft Bar and is open for a tropical getaway. The themed bar is open Tues-Sat and reservations are recommended.

Whether it is morning or night, you now have 2 new locations to try next time you're in Bentonville.
